verses.english: Has there reached you the report of the Overwhelming [event]?
verses.hausa: Lalle ne labãrin (¡iyãma) mai rufe mutãne da tsoronta yã zo maka?

verses.english: [Some] faces, that Day, will be humbled,
verses.hausa: Wasu huskõki a rãnar nan ƙasƙantattu ne.

verses.english: Working [hard] and exhausted.
verses.hausa: Mãsu aikin wahala ne, mãsu gajiya.

verses.english: They will [enter to] burn in an intensely hot Fire.
verses.hausa: Zã su shiga wata wuta mai zãfi.

verses.english: They will be given drink from a boiling spring.
verses.hausa: Ana shãyar da su daga wani marmaro mai zãfin ruwa.

verses.arabic: لَّيْسَ لَهُمْ طَعَامٌ إِلَّا مِن ضَرِيعٍ
verses.english: For them there will be no food except from a poisonous, thorny plant
verses.hausa: Ba su da wani abinci fãce dai daga danyi.

verses.arabic: لَّا يُسْمِنُ وَلَا يُغْنِى مِن جُوعٍ
verses.english: Which neither nourishes nor avails against hunger.
verses.hausa: Bã ya sanya ƙiba, kuma bã zai wadãtar daga yunwa ba.

verses.english: [Other] faces, that Day, will show pleasure.
verses.hausa: Wasu huskõki a rãnar nan mãsu ni'ima ne.

verses.english: With their effort [they are] satisfied
verses.hausa: Game da aikinsu, masu yarda ne.

verses.english: In an elevated garden,
verses.hausa: (Suna) a cikin Aljanna maɗaukakiya.

verses.english: Wherein they will hear no unsuitable speech.
verses.hausa: Bã zã su ji yãsassar magana ba, a cikinta.

verses.english: Within it is a flowing spring.
verses.hausa: A cikinta akwai marmaro mai gudãna.

verses.english: Within it are couches raised high
verses.hausa: A cikinta akwai gadãje maɗaukaka.

verses.english: And cups put in place
verses.hausa: Da kõfuna ar'aje.

verses.english: And cushions lined up
verses.hausa: Da filõli jẽre,

verses.english: And carpets spread around.
verses.hausa: Da katifu shimfiɗe.

verses.arabic: أَفَلَا يَنظُرُونَ إِلَى ٱلْإِبِلِ كَيْفَ خُلِقَتْ
verses.english: Then do they not look at the camels - how they are created?
verses.hausa: Ashe to bã zã su dũbãwa ba ga rãƙumã yadda aka halitta su?

verses.english: And at the sky - how it is raised?
verses.hausa: Da zuwa ga sama yadda aka ɗaukaka ta?

verses.english: And at the mountains - how they are erected?
verses.hausa: Da zuwa ga duwãtsu yadda aka kafa su?

verses.english: And at the earth - how it is spread out?
verses.hausa: Da zuwa ga ƙasa yadda aka shimfiɗã ta?

verses.english: So remind, [O Muhammad]; you are only a reminder.
verses.hausa: sabõda haka, ka yi wa'azi, kai mai yin wa'azi ne kawai.

verses.english: You are not over them a controller.
verses.hausa: Ba ka zama mai ĩkon tanƙwasãwa a kansu ba.

verses.english: However, he who turns away and disbelieves -
verses.hausa: Fãce dai duk wanda ya jũya bãya, kuma ya kãfirta.

verses.english: Then Allah will punish him with the greatest punishment.
verses.hausa: To, Allah zai yi masa azãba, azãbar nan da take mafi girma.

verses.english: Indeed, to Us is their return.
verses.hausa: Lalle ne, zuwa gare Mu kõmõwarsu take.

verses.english: Then indeed, upon Us is their account.
verses.hausa: Sa'an nan lalle ne aikinMu ne Mu yi musu hisãbi.
